actionConfiguration.body:
select td.test_name,td.test_id from  public.test_details as td left join public.chapter_details_master as cdm on td.chapter_tag = cdm.chapter_tag 
join public.course_test_track as ctt on ctt.test_id = td.test_id
join  public.section_master as sm on sm.section_id = ctt.section_id
join public.school_class_info as sci on sm.class_id = sci.class_id where td.deadline = '{{test_date.selectedDate}}' and subject_id={{subject.selectedOptionValue}} and cdm.std= {{std.selectedOptionLabel}} and td.chapter_tag = '{{chap.selectedOptionValue}}' 
and school_id = {{school.selectedOptionValue}}
order by td.test_name asc
